ðŸ“– Summary: docker2exe is a tool that converts Docker images into standalone executables, allowing users to distribute and run containerized applications without requiring Docker to be pre-installed. It supports embedding the image directly into the executable, creating a self-contained package for easy deployment across different platforms.
